department: Public Services Procurement of the Government of Canada (PSPC)
short_summary: Request for standing offer of gloves, wool and nylon to an interior federal correctional facility in the Laval region
description: procurement for gloves, wool and nylon for a period of 36 months
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### 21C11-230082 RFSO Gloves, wool and nylon

* **Reference Number:** WS3979121001-Doc4254025078
* **Amendment Number:** 2
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3979121001
* **Publication Date:** October 11, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date and Time:** October 13, 2023, 14:00:00
* **Status:** Cancelled

**Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)

**Category:** Goods and Services (GD)

**Solicitation Method:** Competitive - Open bidding

**Procurement Category:** Goods

**Industry Classification:** UNSPSC 53102504 - Gloves or mittens

**Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity:** None

**Regions of Delivery:** Laval, Quebec

**Contact Information:**

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **Contact Person:** Mathieu Hevey, PSPC
* **E-mail:** mathieu.hevey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice Description:**

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) requires a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for Gloves, wool and nylon, as per the specifications outlined in Annex B of this document. The successful supplier will be required to provide delivery of the products to Laval, Quebec.

**Use of Standing Offer:**

The Standing Offer will be valid for a period of 3 years, with the possibility of ordering additional quantities during this time period.

**Further Details:**

For further details, please refer to Annex B of this document, which outlines the specifications, pricing, and delivery requirements. Tenderers are expected to review the specifications in detail prior to submitting a bid.

**Closing Date:**

The tender closing date and time is October 13, 2023, at 14:00:00.

**Method of Payment:**

Payment terms will be outlined in the contract.

**Important:**

It is the responsibility of the tenderer to ensure that their bid is complete and submitted on time. Late bids will not be accepted.

## CC

Reference to the Annex  B forwarded with this document for more
